ResourceHeader.Description: This data product contains a list of automatically identified suprathermal proton events measured on the Wide Angle Partition without a Solid State Detector (WAP non-SSD) portion of the STEREO/PLASTIC instrument. This list in conjunction with the IMPACT magnetic field information and PLASTIC solar wind data can aid a user in identifying energetic proton events related to Stream Interaction Regions (SIRs), shocks, upstream events, magnetospheric events, etc.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:

AccessURL.Name: STEREO Science Center - ASCII
